Citation

Source: inst/CITATION

Scott J. A., Gandy A., Mishra, S., Unwin J., Flaxman S. & Bhatt S. (2020). epidemia: Modeling of Epidemics using Hierarchical Bayesian Models.R package version 1.0.0 https://imperialcollegelondon.github.io/epidemia/
